key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position of the media controls indicator in the panel

key.name: panel-index
key.description: Index position within the panel area (-1 for automatic)

key.name: show-track-name
key.description: Display track name next to the icon when playing

key.name: enable-scroll
key.description: Enable scrolling animation for long titles in the panel

key.name: max-title-length
key.description: Maximum number of characters to display in panel before scrolling

key.name: show-artist
key.description: Include artist name with track title in panel

key.name: separator-text
key.description: Text to separate track and artist (default: " • ")

key.name: enable-artist-scroll
key.description: Enable scrolling animation for long artist names in the popup

key.name: enable-title-scroll
key.description: Enable scrolling animation for long track titles in the popup

key.name: enable-album-art-rotation
key.description: Enable rotation animation for album art when music is playing

key.name: album-art-rotation-speed
key.description: Speed of album art rotation in seconds per full rotation (5=fastest, 60=slowest)
